name: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
name_original: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
description:
Enter the fantastic world of Narnia once again in "The Chronicles of
Narnia: Prince Caspian". As the sequel to the smash hit "The Lion, the
Witch and the Wardrobe", the second installment of the Narnia franchise
will give players the freedom to explore the deep universe even further
while controlling various characters including all of the Pevensie
children, Giants, Centaurs and Caspian himself.
